  • Method Details

    • handleRequest

      BulkRestoreArchivedEntitiesResponseInfo<T> handleRequest(Bundle bundle, String title, String detail, String inputString, WebFile inputFile, Map<String,Object> additionalParameters)
      Handle bulk restore request with the given entity numbers
      Parameters:
      bundle - Bundle in which to create transactions for the bulk restore
      title - Title of current bulk restore
      detail - Detail of current bulk restore
      inputString - Comma separated input number/id/key
      inputFile - CSV file to import number/id/key
      additionalParameters - Additional parameters to be used for bulk restore
      Returns:
      response

    • handleRequest

      BulkRestoreArchivedEntitiesResponseInfo<T> handleRequest(Bundle bundle, String title, String detail, String inputString, WebFile inputFile)
      Handle bulk restore request with the given entity numbers
      Parameters:
      bundle - Bundle in which to create transactions for the bulk restore
      title - Title of current bulk restore
      detail - Detail of current bulk restore
      inputString - Comma separated input number/id/key
      inputFile - CSV file to import number/id/key
      Returns:
      response

    • validateRequestInput

      boolean validateRequestInput(String title, String detail, String inputString, WebFile inputFile, BulkRestoreArchivedEntitiesResponseInfoBuilder<T> responseInfoBuilder)
      Validate the input numbers/IDs/keys and populate error messages with BulkRestoreEntitiesResponseInfoBuilder if there is any
      Parameters:
      title - Title of current bulk restore
      detail - Detail of current bulk restore
      inputString - Comma separated input number/id/key
      responseInfoBuilder - Builder of BulkRestoreEntitiesResponseInfo
      Returns:
      True if the list of numbers/IDs/keys is valid.

    • populateRequestInfoDetails

      void populateRequestInfoDetails(String title, String detail, List<String> inputNumbers, Map<String,Object> additionalParameters, BulkRestoreArchivedEntitiesRequestInfoBuilder<T> requestInfoBuilder)
      Analyse and populate input entities' numbers/IDs/keys, validated entities, ignored and duplicate numbers for building BulkRestoreEntitiesRequestInfo
      Parameters:
      title - Title of current bulk restore
      detail - Detail of current bulk restore
      inputNumbers - List of input numbers
      additionalParameters - Additional parameters to be used for bulk restore
      requestInfoBuilder - Builder of BulkRestoreResponseInfo

    • populateRequestInfoDetails

      void populateRequestInfoDetails(String title, String detail, List<String> inputNumbers, BulkRestoreArchivedEntitiesRequestInfoBuilder<T> requestInfoBuilder)
      Analyse and populate input entities' numbers/IDs/keys, validated entities, ignored and duplicate numbers for building BulkRestoreEntitiesRequestInfo
      Parameters:
      title - Title of current bulk restore
      detail - Detail of current bulk restore
      inputNumbers - List of input numbers
      requestInfoBuilder - Builder of BulkRestoreResponseInfo

    • processBulkRestore

      void processBulkRestore(Bundle bundle, BulkRestoreArchivedEntitiesRequestInfo<T> requestInfo)
      Create work items / restore requests for each valid archived entity
      Parameters:
      bundle - Bundle in which to create transactions for the bulk restore
      requestInfo - Information pack contains input entities' numbers/IDs/keys, validated entities, ignored and duplicate numbers.

    • populateResponseInfoMessages

      void populateResponseInfoMessages(BulkRestoreArchivedEntitiesRequestInfo<T> requestInfo, BulkRestoreArchivedEntitiesResponseInfoBuilder<T> responseInfoBuilder)
      Populate info. messages into to be passed to UI for displaying.
      Parameters:
      requestInfo - Information pack contains input entities' numbers/IDs/keys, validated entities, ignored and duplicate numbers.
      responseInfoBuilder - Builder of BulkRestoreEntitiesResponseInfo

    • getBulkRestoreRecords

      IQueryBeanResult<BulkRestoreRecord> getBulkRestoreRecords()
      Get all bulk restore records
      Returns:
      A QueryProcessor of all bulk restore records

    • searchBulkRestoreRecordsByTitle

      IQueryBeanResult<BulkRestoreRecord> searchBulkRestoreRecordsByTitle(String criteria)
      Search BulkRestoreRecord if its title contains the search criteria. This search is case-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      criteria - Title Search Criteria
      Returns:
      A QueryProcessor of BulkRestoreRecords searched by title

    • getBulkRestoreEntityInRestoreRecord

      IQueryBeanResult<EntityInRestoreRecord> getBulkRestoreEntityInRestoreRecord(BulkRestoreRecord bulkRestoreRecord)
      Get all entities in the given bulk restore record
      Parameters:
      bulkRestoreRecord - Bulk restore record
      Returns:
      A QueryProcessor of EntityInRestoreRecord in the given bulkRestoreRecord
